misc: Primary organizer of the Hector Trophée event.
biography: We are delighted to welcome Toni back to the Hector Trophée. As many golf fans know, Toni is not only a fierce competitor, but also the primary organizer behind the Hector Trophée event, without whom the tournament would simply not exist.

Toni is a golfer known for his calm and collected demeanor on the course, which often belies a fierce competitive spirit. Representing Hirsala Golf, Toni has been a consistent presence in the Hector Trophée, appearing in all editions of the tournament since its inception.

To date, Toni has participated in 11 editions of the Hector Trophée, securing the coveted Hector Trophée title on 3 occasions. In addition to his pairplay prowess, Toni has also distinguished himself as an exceptional individual player, winning the Victor Trophy twice. We anticipate that Toni will continue to be a formidable player in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, marking his 12th appearance in the tournament.
